author: ayaxlabombarda
title: Innovatio Crowdfunding Launchpad
description: Cardano区块链DeFi生态系统上的Launchpads不支持区块链世界以外的项目。

f6_assessments.q0: Proposal addresses the problem of supporting funding solutions from various blockchains and currencies. It will ad value to the Cardano ecosystem by bringing in users from other blockchains and from the Fiat using world. The key metrics are inline with the challenge as it measures user growth. The proposal is able to scale as it aims to accept/provide any kind of funding.
f6_assessments.q1: The relevant skills and team is presented in an attached document. They have a list of plutus devs they selected to hire in the future. The budget is reasonable and borken down into identifiable items. 1 year to complete this project seems doable with the current team. They provide little detail in the technical side, like languages used etc. Letting the reader know about the languages you choose to build this, will boost confidence in your abilities. They do explain what is getting built and how some of the features will function. They rely on their team and partners to help solve any upcoming challenges/risks. It wouldn't hurt to write down a list of potential risks and how you will address them. Letting the reader know you have considered these risks instead of waiting for them to reveal themselves will boost voter confidence.
f6_assessments.q2: They provided 2 roadmaps. One for the 4 months of development that the funding is used for and the other roadmap shows how the project grows  and develops over the course of 1 year. They provided a few KPIs that are quite easy to measure. They include, money raised, user growth, projects funded... etc. They address the problem of funding projects that aren't on the blockchain and solve it by supporting all currencies to help fund digital based projects.

f6_assessments.q0: I think that together with project catalyst this proposal could help a lot to the projects that want to be developed in the cardano ecosystem. People will be able to finance them directly and in turn a lot of DeFi project ideas can be implemented thanks to financial aid. Both the platform and what it will contribute helps the development of the DeFi ecosystem of cardano so it is perfect
f6_assessments.q1: I have read the proposal carefully and I have to admit that it is very well put forward and the general scheme for the development of it clearly allows us to see that the idea is good and is firmly established in the team. They have already begun to develop it for a while and also provides a lot of information from the team members seeming that they have adequate characteristics for the development of the proposal
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap is very clear and has explained what they propose to do at each stage so that progress can be audited perfectly. You can also take advantage of the way they provide to check the success and measure the performance indicators that they have writen in the proposal

f6_assessments.q0:
I firmly believe that this proposal is very innovative and will provide numerous benefits for the Cardano community in addition to attracting new members due to the simplicity of the offered services for non-specialized users.

It is a unique opportunity for DeFi projects to thrive with a secure financial method.
f6_assessments.q1:
The very detailed way in which the proposal is explained is a clear example of working hours and tireless study to carry out the platform and achieve success.

There is a precise path on carrying out tasks and how to meet the objectives effectively.

In addition, a very innovative and elaborate idea is proposed, which will attract the user for his simple way of managing and interacting and the opportunities presented to him without the need to be an expert in the technical field.

I find the approach of the project and the novelties that arise in the adoption of blockchain technology very interesting.

I believe that this proposal will be implemented successfully and with good results.
f6_assessments.q2:
It is actually a well-structured project, with distributed and professional tasks working on the progress of the platform. The involvement of the group is a reality, after a year of research and market studies and the possibilities of creating a platform available to everyone, always under the principles of auditability and transparency.

A firm approach without secrets makes me see a successful project in the near future.

I see complete information to check the development of the project, since it has benchmarks, sets established dates and indicators of success.

f6_assessments.q0: The Innovatio team is proposing a launchpad/crowdfunding platform that would expand Cardano's DeFi ecosystem approach, so I think they are fully aligned with their goals.
f6_assessments.q1: I have read a very interesting proposal, I see that few projects are concerned about understanding and wanting to adopt fiat users who do not have the technical knowledge to use blockchain technology, so it seemed to me a totally valid and important point to support this proposal. The team has proposals founded before and seems to be committed to the community, the plan is clear, concise, well explained and detailed, so I think they can develop it without problem, not only have the conditions but also the support of other important communities in the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q2: From the previous Fund to this one, I have seen an important evolution in the audit issue, in the previous proposal it was not very clear what they wanted to develop and present with the requested funds, in this case I see it better explained and with different ways to audit it, their vision of success (long term) clear KPIs (measure the impact/success) and a roadmap that allows us to know if they meet the deadlines or not.

f6_assessments.q0:
We know that crowdfunding is developed dramatically more than 10 years ago, and nowadays they're famous with some platforms like Kickstarter, Indiegogo, Gofundme... they've helped a lot of start-ups and individuals to develop their idea from paper. So, this idea of a Crowdfunding launchpad is very important to Cardano ecosystem now and then. 
The proposer also articulates the context of success and lists key metrics that aligns with the challenge settings.
f6_assessments.q1:
Proposer provides very detailed information about what this project will help in functions and implementation plan to get their goals including what it will help to idea founder, how they can attract them, their marketing campaign to spread this launchpad... and all of this info is used for more than the 4 months scope of this proposal. 
Of course, they have a year of preparation for this project, so the proposer gave us a detailed roadmap and the budget is fit with it.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer provides a very detailed plan for implementation, and the proposer also added some info about the adoption and delivery of the solution. 
From my experiences, I can see some challenges and difficulties in this type of project, but the proposer also describes how can they solve them in the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This DeFi project will group blockchain and no blockchain projects in a decentralized platform where they will have the posibility to be funded by other individuals or projects. That means that lots of DeFi projects will be helped and no blockchain projects will se the possibilities that blockchain brings. Knowing that, this proposal is exactly what the challenge wants.
f6_assessments.q1: Furthermore  than the plan is very well explained even providing a good example of how the platform will work, they also provide a document with information about the mvp. Another document with descriptions of every team member is attached, I think that this needs to be mandatory for every project because is the only way to know that the people behind the project are  real. From my point of view the proposal has a high chance to be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: What the success looks like section is very detailed and even divided in 3 steps for checking the success of the proposal. Even a roadmap of the following 4 months helps a lot to compare if the project is being developed as they pretend. The KPIs are measurable which is an indispensable requirement of them, so adding this to all the above I consider that the proposal can be audited without problems.

f6_assessments.q0: The opportunities that this platform brings to developers and entrepreneurs make it easier for them to create projects thanks to cardano. This attracts teams outside of cardano to its ecosystem, increasing the number of projects in it while helping DeFi projects already under development within cardano
f6_assessments.q1: I think it is very important to have a plutus programmer for the development of the smart contract, although having a solid idea once it is financed they will achieve it easily. The rest of the team members seem very competent and the plan is excellently developed. So I think they can carry it out
f6_assessments.q2: The project is divided into stages. This helps a lot in the task of auditing the project during the different stages. At the same time, very useful performance indicators are provided for this task. I believe that the information regarding this section is completely covered by the proposal and it will be an easy task thanks to the information provided

f6_assessments.q0:
Relation to personal qualifications: As a year-long activist in both party-politics and non-party related political (grassroots) groups I know how important decentralisation can be for economic empowerment. However, it is important that DeFi projects have good accessability and also enable to bank the unbanked instead of just beeing an elitist project. I have done some personal research on both DeFi and microlending especially with a focus on Global and social justice and hope to bring in a valuable perspective on accessability for poorer people with my reviews in this challenge. Since this project serves, beyond other things to distribute funds by crowdfunding, it adresses this accessibility issue by identifying it within the challenge as something that needs to be solved.
  It clearly articulates how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem. Even though the KPIs don't perfectly match with those of the challenge, they do actually broaden it by other possible success criteria. The proposal will, if properly implemented, be able to scale. Feedback: Great idea.
f6_assessments.q1: I can very well see that since my last critiques, the proposal was severely improved and now ticks all of the boxes. It has a feasible implementation plan, details are explained sufficiently, the budget is broken down. The team generally seems up to the challenge and can be trusted to deliver something feasible.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs, milestones, and comprehensible roadmap are presented. The problem and the solution are described really well, which makes every part of this proposal auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: A crowdfunding platform would boost cardano's decentralized finance ecosystem by raising funds and launching projects.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan presented in the proposal is very well defined, very well explained, it is very clear how the platform works and how to attract investors and projects. I also see that the project has previous funded proposals and a long history within the Cardano community, so I see no complications to develop this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The audit is also very well detailed, both their long-term vision of success, the roadmap detailing what they will develop at what stage and when, and also the KPIs to measure success and impact in the future.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal seems to be in line with the challenge, they seek to expand the opportunities and adoption of Cardano's decentralized finance. They promise a crowdfunding platform capable of driving the ecosystem, both at transaction, adoption and consumption levels.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is well explained and detailed, they have a precise plan, the platform and market very well studied and it seems to be a team with experience and necessary skills. The only thing that could pull me back is not having a Plutus programmer, but I understand that in the current circumstances, they are in high demand.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal presented, presents several ways to audit its success, such as the KPIs, its vision of future success and the stages of development, so I do not think there is any problem in properly auditing the success and development of this project.

f6_assessments.q0: A successful crowdfunding platform will facilitate the pooling of assets to further accelerate the Cardano DeFi ecosystem.  Innovatio address not just the launching of projects but the auditing and potential stopping of projects improving the accountability of how investments are allocated.
f6_assessments.q1: Innovatio has an experienced team.  With previous Catalyst funds the team has launched a professional quality website that is recruiting investors and entrepreneurs. The project plan addresses important issues of marketing, ease of use, legal regulations, need for digital identies and/or KYC.  An example process is described in depth.
f6_assessments.q2: 5 clear KPIs are provided including funded projects, funding raised, number of users, active users, and ecosystem collaborations. The budget specifies the monthly salary of the team members.

f6_assessments.q0: A crowdfunding launchpad is in line with the guidelines of this challenge, personally I think it can contribute a lot to the adoption and growth of Cardano's DeFi ecosystem, that's why I give it 5 stars.
f6_assessments.q1: I have been reviewing Innovatio's track record, as it says they have been developing for more than a year, with a lot of market research and development and I could find proposals from them since Fund 3, I have also seen that they have a partnership with another Cardano project called GameChangerWallet and the plan presented in the proposal is very well developed, I believe that Innovatio's team and the plan is totally feasible for the development of this platform, that's why I give it 5 stars.
f6_assessments.q2: I think one of the best things in the plan is the audit, they provide us with their vision for the future, KPIs and a clear roadmap, so the community will have several ways to audit the development and success of this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Like project catalyst brings a large number of DeFi projects to Cardano to Cardano, this proposal would act in a similar way since many of the projects that are not funded here could go to the platform to seek funding and thus the number of DeFi projects in Cardano successfully implemented increase.
f6_assessments.q1: A great explanation about the plan presented. It is not a very large team but they fill all the necessary positions and it seems that they want to expand the team so as not to leave any gap unfilled. After reading the proposal and the information about the team members it seems that they will be able to implement it.
f6_assessments.q2: Of course they have a very detailed plan regarding the development process of the platform. It should be noted that they include KPIs (important in software development) and dates to be met to audit the project.

f6_assessments.q0:
This is the best way to boost Cardano's DeFi! With platforms like Catalyst or this proposal 
the ease of carrying out projects in this field is greatly increased, allowing teams eager to surprise to complete their projects.
f6_assessments.q1: They have 1 year of development and the plan seems clear. Good document with information of the team showing that they cover all fields needed for this proposal. Seems like they have experience in the field and they are working hard in the project.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal is a good example of how to define KPIs and how to show clearly a way for auditing the success of the proposal. Clearly they have experience with writing proposals in other funds so they have done a good job here.

f6_assessments.q0: Innovative as the name of the team! This could be a great way to attract people to Cardano and even help people who are already in a DeFi project in Cardano because they will be able to recieve funds from other teams and entrepreuners. The adoption of Cardano will be increased.
f6_assessments.q1: At the beginning I thought that there were not enough information of the team, that they only provided the members that will be needed, but I was wrong because it is attached a very well done document with lot of information of the team. The plan presnted is as well highly detailed and I can admit that the proposal is well defined.
f6_assessments.q2: The success part is clearly defined. They have the idea of how to implement this in a good way. Also there are 3 dates to use as checkpoint of the work of the team. KPIs needed are defined and the roadmap is written. Let's see if they are able to follow everything as they say.

f6_assessments.q0: i find that this type of proposal is perfect for this challenge. they are not only creating somehow a defi platform but also making for other teams that are developing defi projects on cardano an easier path for success. thank to that cardano's defi will be bigger.
f6_assessments.q1:
the plan is widley explained: how it will work with an example, what are the possibilities there, marketing plan...
in the team part, they still need a plutus developer, but for the rest of the positions they are fully covered so that is a good start
f6_assessments.q2: they have detailed how to audit their proposal in a time line with several steps that they will follow. kpis are also defined, very important for the project. in general, they seem to be easily auditable because they provide enough information of how to do it.

f6_assessments.q0: In my opinion, ideas like these are perfect for this challenge. attracts investors, projects, developers to Cardano and in this way certain that new DeFi projects will be created by people who are already within the ecosystem who with the help of Innovatio can be financed or by teams external to Cardano who will discover the multiple options in this ecosystem
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is clearly detailed, includes all the possibilities offered by your project and an example is also illustrated explaining the process that will be carried out on the platform, implying that the idea is firmly established. It also has a very complete team, clear information about them that always helps to remove insecurity from the project
f6_assessments.q2: They are very clear about how it will be measured whether the project is being successful or not. They are divided into 3 stages explaining the expected result in each of them and also add kpis that are always very useful for auditing a project and checking that it is developing as it should

f6_assessments.q0: A platform like this will increase a lot the number of DeFi projects that will be developed, because this platform will provide them a financial method for their begining. Moreover, non DeFi projects will be able to be published in the platform, and they will see the opportunities that DeFi can bring to them encouraging those teams to apply Cardano DeFi to their projects.
f6_assessments.q1: Seems like their have been a year developing this idea without being funded from anywhere. This action shows that the team strongly wants to implement the proposal. As they show they have qualified people and they are hiring for some employees that they need for finishing building the team. The plan is well developed, it shows an Agile way of work and with a very clear roadmap.
f6_assessments.q2: The progress seems auditable because they have clearly divided the work that they are going to do for each phase of the development and they have estimated a date for each improvement of the platform. In addition, they provide clearly identifiable KPIs that will help in the assessment of the success of the proposal. It is good to read that they are providing public videos showing the progress of their work.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a good idea for the challenge. A direct and indirect way of boosting Cardano's DeFi. Direct because it will be a decentralized platform because of the use of smart contracts. Indirect because it will help lots of Cardano projects to be ended and bring new ideas to the ecosystem
f6_assessments.q1: I think so. The plan is very clear, for sure they have been raising this for a long time and are even developing the project without funding. With the help of it, I think they will be able to implement it. About the team, the information they provide about it is surprising. It is seen that they are people with the necessary knowledge and I hope they implement the project wellhave been planed
f6_assessments.q2: Great explanation on how to consider if the project is developing satisfactorily. Divided this into 3, 6 and 12 months and including a 4-month roadmap, I think this is enough information to audit the project. By adding KPIs, I believe that nothing is left to be covered in this section

solution: 开发一个众筹平台，接受区块链世界外部和内部项目的资金。
experience: 在上一个催化剂中成立的团队，有一年学习/工作的项目，有不同专长的团队。
